title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5006.6 - Ticket responsibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5006.6 - Ticket responsibility

State Regulations
(a) An
instant lottery ticket is a bearer instrument. (b) The commission shall not be responsible
for lost or stolen instant lottery tickets. (c) The commission shall not be responsible
for tickets claimed by a player in error for a lower prize at an agent
location. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5006.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
